total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the number 7 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the pattern of transformation from the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q3: Apply the transformation pattern to the number 7 pattern in the quiz input grid.
Q4: Identify the positions where the number 7 should be moved to according to the transformation pattern.
Q5: Generate the output grid by applying the transformation to the quiz input grid.
